body_html:
@joseandrespena @bingo619 We actually need Command Line Tools from Xcode 8.2 (macOS 10.12) to build PyTorch with CUDA 9.2 on macOS (because otherwise Eigen will give compilation error). The correct steps should be:

  1. Install Command Line Tools from Xcode 8.2 (macOS 10.12) from https://download.developer.apple.com/Developer_Tools/Command_Line_Tools_macOS_10.12_for_Xcode_8.2/Command_Line_Tools_macOS_10.12_for_Xcode_8.2.dmg

  2. Set export DEVELOPER_DIR=/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools, then run python setup.py install to build PyTorch.
